title: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Kochou-Tomioka Family (Doujinshi)
description:
A Kimetsu No Yaiba AU.

Please read from right to left. Based on a convo between the author and artist about the GiyuShino ship fantasy that somehow found its way into reality in comic form.

***CONTAINS MANGA SPOILERS, TREAD CAREFULLY ***
